name: Rhapsody Side Table
description: Inspired by the original Rhapsody lamp, by her fiancée Patrick Coard Paris, Kifu Paris designs a sculptural side table as an ode to his iconic lighting collection. The tabletop is inlaid in cream shagreen and sits on a cluster of 4 bronze-patina brass "rhapsody" legs that are a mixture of solid and cut-out shapes. Available in other iterations as a desk, console and breakfast table. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KST41. Handmade. Antique Natural Shagreen surface, bronze-patina brass legs. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines
